channel.title: Annual Summary on DSkrzypiec Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Annual Summary on DSkrzypiec Blog

item.title: Summary of 2024
item.description: Intro Time flies! It’s time to summarize the year 2024. For additional context you might want to check the summary of 2023. Running paused The beginning of 2024 (January, February) was a period of intense running training in preparation for the Warsaw Half Marathon. I intended to achieve a time below 2 hours (around 1:50) in this race. Unfortunately, at the beginning of March, pain around the knee and tension in the quadriceps muscle prevented further training.

item.title: Summary of 2023
item.description: Continuation of 2022 I would like to start by mentioning the things I continued doing in 2023, beginning with sports. I maintained my running routine, pursued table tennis training, and practiced fundamental calisthenics, including pull-ups, push-ups, and dips. However, I decided to discontinue my Russian language studies, mostly due to lack of time. As for my MacBook Air M1 from 2020, it’s still in pretty decent condition, even after nearly three years of heavy usage.

item.title: Summary of 2022
item.description: Continuation of 2021 highlights As the first highlight of year 2022 I wanted to mention the continuation of most of habits that I’ve started in 2021. I’m still jog regularly. I tried to learn Russian somehow regularly over the year. I had some breaks but generally I learned a bit and didn’t forget what I’ve learned in 2021. I still do pull ups and chin ups on daily basis. I’ve run three (3km, 6km and 6km) Runmageddons in 2022!

item.title: Summary of 2021
item.description: Started jogging In January, after a long pandemic home isolation I’ve started jogging. For my whole life I always hate jogging. I love most sports but running was something else. After almost a year in pandemic with gyms being closed and almost no going outside I though that I’ll give it a try. At first two tries I couldn’t run 500 meters without a break for catching a breath. Unexpectedly body adaptation was very quick!

item.title: Summary of 2020
item.description: Intro Starting from this year on I’ll try to make a post per year with summary of my personal and professional important events within the year. 2020 highlights Finished application for a factoring company SARS-CoV-2 Changed team and position at work I’ve started learning Russian I’ve build a PC Ca≈Çka died My daughter was born Finished application for a factoring company In April 2020 I’ve finished working on the project for a factoring company.
